verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing and shout for joy
To the One who reigns on high
And is living here in our hearts
Rules in heaven above

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Great and mighty Saviour
Our most awesome Redeemer,
Glorious in splendor are You Lord,
Victorious and awesome are You Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sing, dance, clap your hands
And rejoice all over the land
Proclaim that Jesus is King
And to our God let us sing
